### CITY OF SHALLOWATER WATER AND SEWER SERVICES

**Service Calls: Monday-Friday, 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m., call 806-696-4300**

**Call the Shallowater Police Department at 806-696-4225, and if the officer is on patrol the Lubbock County Sherriff’s Office will answer and they will contact the officer on duty.  The officer will notify the appropriate personnel to assist you.**

The City of Shallowater Utility Department manages the city’s water supply, raw water transmission system, water treatment plant, the water distribution system, wastewater collection system, and the wastewater treatment plant.

The City of Shallowater provides water, sewer, and garbage service. The following companies provide additional utility services to Shallowater residents:

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| ``` Xcel Energy (electricity based on your address) ``` | ``` 1-800-895-4999 ``` |
| ``` South Plains Electric Co-Op (electricity – based on your address) ``` | ``` 806-775-7766 ``` |
| ``` Atmos Energy (gas) ``` | ``` 1-800-621-1867 ``` |
| ``` Kinetic Communications (phone, cable, internet) ``` | ``` 1-877-520-5220 ``` |
| ``` SuddenLink (phone, cable, internet) ```  ``` Vexus (phone, cable, internet) ``` | ``` 806-793-2222 ```  ``` 806-658-2150 ``` |

**REQUIREMENTS TO OPEN A CITY OF SHALLOWATER ACCOUNT**

Each customer must complete and sign a
[Utility Service Application and Agreement](https://shallowatertx.us/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/City-of-Shallowater-Application-for-Utility-Services.pdf)
.

[Consent to Disclose Utility Customer Information](https://shallowatertx.us/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/Consent-to-Disclose-Utility-Customer-Information.pdf)

City of Shallowater
P.O. Box 246
Shallowater, Texas 79363

Shallowater City Hall
801 Ave. G
Shallowater, Texas 79363

806-696-4253

There is a mail slot (night drop) located in the front door of City Hall for your convenience if you would like to make a payment or submit your new service information after hours.

**If you are an existing customer and moving please contact City Hall at 806-696-4300 and we will be happy to assist you.**

Water meters are read approximately the 15th of each month. The billing period covers from the 15th of one month to the 15th of the next month. The utility billing is mailed on the last working day of the month and payment is due by the 15th of the month. Final payment day for each month is the 25th.

Example: Meter is read on April 15th. The billing period is from March 15th to April 15th, the bill is mailed on April 30th, and payment is due on May 15th.

[![](https://shallowatertx.us/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Water-Calculations-and-how-your-meter-is-read.jpg)](https://shallowatertx.us/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Water-Calculations-and-how-your-meter-is-read.jpg)

**If you have questions regarding your bill or how your meter is read please contact City Hall and we will be happy to assist you.**

[UTILITY RATES SHEET FOR FY 2025-26](https://shallowatertx.us/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/UTILITY-RATES-SHEET-FOR-FY-2025-26.pdf)

**Please contact City Hall at 806-696-4300 with any questions on your garbage rates.**

**We purchase water from the City of Lubbock.**

**City of Shallowater sales tax rate 8.25%**

**The Senior Rates are available to citizens 62 years of age or older.**

**You must contact City Hall to receive the Senior Rate.**

**Please contact City Hall at 806-696-4300 if you have questions.**

**Pay in person at City Hall, Monday-Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.**

**Pay in Person at City Hall after hours by using the Night Drop located on the front door of City Hall.**

**Bank Draft - Drafted on the 10th of each month – Please click here for a Draft Authorization Form.**

All utility billings not received at City Hall within the due date (15th of each month or the next business day if the 15
should fall on a weekend or holiday) are considered delinquent, and a late charge of 10% of the total amount shown on the bill will be added to the amount due.

If you cannot make your payment before the 25
please contact City Hall at 806-696-4300 to make a payment arrangement.

If you have a balance of $75.00 or greater by the 25th day of the month, then all water and sewer services will be scheduled to be disconnected if you have not made a payment arrangement.

Once a customer’s utility services are scheduled to be disconnected by being listed on the monthly disconnect list prepared by the city, an administrative reconnect fee of $25 will be charged to the customer’s account. This fee will be charged regardless if the service was disconnected.

Once the full payment is received in full by the city, then the service will be reconnected on the same business day, provided the payment is received no later than 4:00 p.m. If payment is received by the city after 4:00 p.m., then service will be reconnected on the next business day.

Residential garbage service is provided with your City utility account.

Commercial garbage service is priced by the number of dumpsters and the number of weekly pick-ups.

Contact City Hall at 806-696-4300 to report damaged dumpsters, dumpsters that were not emptied on pickup days, or for commercial service and fee information.

You can find more garbage service information by clicking
[here.](https://shallowatertx.us/Garbage-Services/)

The City of Shallowater purchases water from the City of Lubbock.  The City of Shallowater follows the City of Lubbock’s irrigation schedule and water restrictions.
